front.title: Recommendation for block cipher modes of operation

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Recommendation specifies the Galois/Counter Mode (GCM), an algorithm for authenticated encryption with associated data, and its specialization, GMAC, for generating a message authentication code (MAC) on data that is not encrypted. GCM and GMAC are modes of operation for an underlying approved symmetric key block cipher.
